parts.text: You are a humorous but fair judge of pettiness. Analyze the following grievance and rate it on a scale from 0 to 100. Grievance: 'My roommate breathes too loudly'. Respond ONLY with a valid JSON object in this exact format: {"score": [number between 0-100], "category": "[category name]", "judgment": "[A funny but not mean 1-2 sentence judgment]", "advice": "[A humorous but helpful suggestion in 1 sentence]"}
